website_summaries.verdict: Tasty gummies that are rich in a variety of vitamins and folic acid, but lack iron that is important during pregnancy.
pros: Gummy vitamins that are easy to take and have a decent flavor
Not likely to cause stomach upset
Formulated with essential vitamins, including A, B, C, D, and E. Also contain folic acid
Made with natural plant-based colors and flavors
cons: Some bottles arrived with melted vitamins
No iron, so you'll have to take a separate supplement

customer_reviews.title: Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are NOT safe for those with peanut or tree nut allergies. They are manufactured in a factory where nuts are also processed. Unfortunately, the parts of the labels the seller chose to include on Amazon, does NOT include the tree nut warning. It was only after I purchased two bottles and read the labels did I discover they were lethal to those with tree nut allergies. I'm returning these immediately. Allergy information must be included on Amazon. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: NOYB

customer_reviews.title: These are the best prenatal citamins
customer_reviews.text: These are the best prenatal citamins, I have probably tried 5 different ones and love these. They get a bad rap in some reviews because they can melt in shipment but that happened to me and you can easily call or click for a replacement, which comes very quickly and was totally useable. Melting could happen to any gummy vitamin. These are by far my favorite multi vitamin, period, pregnant ot not (been pregnant 3 times). No fishy or weird tastes at all and very gentle on the tummy. I plan to keep taking them and add a calcium supplement after I am through the pre/post natal period.
customer_reviews.author: T Raymond

customer_reviews.title: They taste just okay--the texture is a little funny. But they're not bad
customer_reviews.text: They taste just okay--the texture is a little funny. But they're not bad, and they seem to get the job done! I've had better gummies, but I would recommend them to my other prego friends.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Taste pretty good, for a vitamin anyway! They contain the ingredients I need and are gluten free.
customer_reviews.author: Brendell

customer_reviews.title: Weird aftertaste, but good product.
customer_reviews.text: These had a bit of a weird almost fishy aftertaste, but they don't make me nauseous like most other vitamins do so that's a huge plus. Would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Weimer

customer_reviews.title: Prenatal Gummies
customer_reviews.text: They aren't the worst in the world but it's almost as if they are coasted in sugar which is unappealing to me. I'd rather take children's gummies if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to take than giant pills, but has a bit of an aftertaste and is really sugary.
customer_reviews.author: J Clements

customer_reviews.title: Missing important ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Taste great however its missing key ingredients for mom and baby, like Iron and calcium. It does contain soy and tuna. GMO soy is bad for anyone especially pregnant moms and baby. I will not be purchasing this again instead I'll go to natural herbal store and buy the liquid version which is all natural and without soy.
customer_reviews.author: Aidaofficially

customer_reviews.title: Don't order in summer will arrive unusable
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these in the past and they were great! Unfortunately this time they were delivered and had melted into a big clump in the bottle. Completely unusable so I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Bannister

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Very easy to ingest
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Very easy to ingest. The only thing I do not like is that they are sugar coated.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthea Rogiers

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste and consistency
customer_reviews.text: I guess I can't give this product 1 star becuase I'm sure they work, however, they are not the same consistency as other gummy vitamins I take. They aren't very chewy, the taste is a bit off, and they really are just kind of yucky. I'll finish the bottle but try and different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Bock

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me of sweet and sour candy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a timely manner and provides adequate amount of vitamins needed. I must admit that I did not care for the taste. Reminds me of sweet and sour candy. Gives you a sweet taste followed by sour.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and Gentle on the tummy
customer_reviews.text: This was the best prenatal vitamin I tried. Most of them messed with my stomach and these were the gentlest. Plus they taste yummy! I looked forward to taking these every day.
customer_reviews.author: Erynn Baird

customer_reviews.title: I love these! I got the vita fusion ones and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I got the vita fusion ones and they were gross. I had to go back to these. I am in an area where it's a small town and they don't have a variety of anything. So, I had to return the vita fusion back to walmart and I ordered these. Love them! and they don't make me sick
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Taste really good but it contains tuna.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this taste really good. I wish I could finish the whole thing. I'm just little concern about taking this vitamin because it contains "tuna". I'm taking this while pregnant so I hope it will be ok because I can't take any other vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: K. L.

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting ever
customer_reviews.text: The yummiest gummy vitamins I've ever had. They taste like fruit-juice-based gummy bears! I'm kind of sad that I don't need prenatals anymore, because these were so delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel N.

customer_reviews.title: great taste and texture
customer_reviews.text: great taste and texture; helped me take my daily vitamin while pregnant when i could no longer take tablets without getting nauseous
customer_reviews.author: Kari S

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Yummy! Gotta love gummies! They are easy to take and easy on your stomach!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The taste is amazing. I wish I would have known about this ...
customer_reviews.text: The taste is amazing. I wish I would have known about this vitamin from the beginning of my pregnancy when I couldn't pass the other big nasty pills.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These taste like candy so of course I love eating them everyday
customer_reviews.author: Christy S

customer_reviews.title: Best Prenatals
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these Prenatals. I’ve tried 3-4 different kinds and these are the only ones that haven’t made me nauseous. I would recommend buying them in-store and not online because I could see where they melt in the heat I got mine at Smiths so I didn’t have that problem but I would recommend these for anyone that’s expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Jessalyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I'm gluten free and looked around for some time before deciding on these. This is my 4th pregnancy. These are by far my favorite, I have no nausea after taking them and now I'm at the end of pregnancy feeling wonderful. I have been taking these since I was 6 weeks pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous ingredients
customer_reviews.text: These use the toxic form of vitamin A. Retinyl palmitate is pregnancy category X, not to be used during pregnancy. You're not even supposed to use it in lotion while pregnant. New findings suggest it may cause birth defects. Also folic acid is bad for those with the MTHFR mutation. Should be methylfolate. These shouldn't be labeled as prenatal vitamins at all!
customer_reviews.author: Natalya the Spy

product_meta.title: Nutrition Now Prenatal Gummy Vitamins, 75 Count
product_meta.description: Nutrition Now Vitamin Adult Gummy Prena. This product is good for health. It is a high quality product. This product is manufactured in United States.
feature_bullets: This product is good for health
It is a high quality product
This product is manufactured in United States
